title: Basic
description: The basic module defines the fundamental metadata elements that will be required for all publicly released USGS metadata records, for example, re-usable citation components and time periods, basic identification information, discovery elements for use in the Science Data Catalog (SDC), and access to data and related materials.

contact.description: An array of contacts to be referenced throughout the metadata.

errorMessage.minItems: At least one Contact is required. Identify person and organizations that will be cited for this resource.  Contacts only need to be described once, then that person/organization is given a role relative to the citation metadata context.

status.errorMessage: Status of the resource is required.

resourceMaintenance.errorMessage: Resource Maintenance is required to describe how frequently the resource will be updated.

resourceFormat.errorMessage: A description of the Resource Format is required.

keyword.description: Controlled vocabularies for providing descriptions of the data to enable data discovery.

items.errorMessage: A thesaurus citation is required for each set of keywords.

errorMessage.oneOf: Either a Start Date or Start Geologic Age is required in the resource Time Period.

required.keyword: Thematic Keywords are required. Study Method, Place, Program, and Study Environment keywords are recommended.
required.abstract: An abstract(brief narrative summary of the content of the resource) is required.
required.purpose: A purpose, a summary of intentions for which the resource was created, is required.
required.citation: A main resource Citation is required.

ResourceDistribution.description: Describes how the public can access the data and relevant information a user would need to know regarding the access and use of the data.

items.description: Describes how the public can access the data and relevant information a user would need to know regarding the access and use of the data

errorMessage.const: Metadata Date requires at least one date with dateType = lastUpate.

errorMessage.contains: Date the metadata record was most recently updated is required.

metadataContact.errorMessage: At least one Metadata Contact is required.

errorMessage.minItems: At least one responsibleParty is required in the resource citation.

identifier.errorMessage: At least one of the identifiers in the main citation must be a Digital Object Identifier(DOI), i.e, namespace = info:doi/

required.title: A title is required in the resource citation.
required.responsibleParty: At least one responsibleParty is required in the resource citation.
required.identifier: At least one identifier(DOI) is required in the main resource citation.

errorMessage.const: Metadata records require at least one date with dateType = creation.
